thread.title: BRIEF-Echelon Partners With Allied Telesis To Deliver Solutions For Smart Cities And Smart Buildings

title: BRIEF-Echelon Partners With Allied Telesis To Deliver Solutions For Smart Cities And Smart Buildings

organizations.name: smart cities and smart buildings reuters

text:
April 11, 2018 / 6:33 PM / in 16 minutes BRIEF-Echelon Partners With Allied Telesis To Deliver Solutions For Smart Cities And Smart Buildings Reuters Staff 
April 12 (Reuters) - Echelon Corp: 
* PARTNERS WITH ALLIED TELESIS TO DELIVER SOLUTIONS FOR SMART CITIES AND SMART BUILDINGS 
* ALLIED TELESIS TO BE AUTHORIZED TO INCORPORATE COâ€™S INTELLIGENT LIGHTING SOLUTIONS INTO ITS SMART CITY AND SMART CAMPUS PROJECTS AMONG OTHERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
